text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to identify, per German Civ. Pro. Code (ZPO) 1032(1), that German courts must decline jurisdiction when arbitration agreements exist. The candidate answer mentions that German courts respect arbitration agreements under ArbG \u00a7 34 (German Arbitration Act) and may stay proceedings (Section 4.3).
